alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:07PM CDT until March 26 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday was 28.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 14.1 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Noxubee River Macon 26.0 27.0 Fri 8 pm CDT 23.6 20.6 18.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 800 AM CDT.
